comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Fixed repository-1.4.dtd in revision 697418.

Curiously, this fix had already been included in the repository-1.5.dtd copy when it was added in revision 638409, as part of JCR-1472!

description: The repository DTDs document the cluster syncDelay attribute as being the sync interval in seconds, when it really is the interval in milliseconds.
summary: The cluster syncDelay attribute is milliseconds
